visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a boxplot chart with the title 'Configuring whisker lengths'. The chart should have specific whisker lengths for different data points, and the y-axis should not have a title. The chart should not display a legend. The data series should include three data points with different whisker lengths.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a boxplot chart. The chart type is set to 'boxplot', and the title is 'Configuring whisker lengths'. The y-axis does not have a title, and the legend is disabled. The data series includes three data points, each with different whisker lengths specified. The first data point has a whisker length of 50%, the second has a lower whisker length of 150%, and the third has an upper whisker length of 10%. These configurations ensure that the boxplot chart visually represents the specified whisker lengths for each data point.
